Articles.Content:
I would like to request if someone would be kind enough to write a plugin that would allow KSP to generate applicant kerbals with the names of twitch followers as applicants ready to join the space program, I have tried adding them in manually via the save file editing and they do show up in the astronaut complex but i keep getting a cfg load error as soon as I try launching or switching to a ship then the game reverts to using its own generated kerbals removing the ones i manually placed there using generated ones as a template and only changing the names. I have already been pointed to the custom kerbals mod and have considered it however that would still require writing in each kerbal manually so i was thinking of the follower applicant generation as a more viable option when dealing with larger numbers of followers.

Bonus feature: the ability to give the kerbals custom color suits (one color for follower, one for moderator and another for donator) that can be chosen manually.

If this could be done i would be eternally grateful and would also put a dedication mention on the stream description for the modder.

MaLuS
